details:
A Secunia security advisory reports:

> Two vulnerabilities have been reported in Razor-agents,
> which can be exploited by malicious people to cause a DoS
> (Denial of Service).
>
> 1. An unspecified error in the preprocessing of certain
>    HTML messages can be exploited to crash the
>    application.
> 2. A bug in the discovery logic causes Razor-agents to go
>    into an infinite loop and consume a large amount of
>    memory when discovery fails.
